citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00pm on
01-Aug-17.
Inspector contacted licensee. Licensee communicated with inspector and stated they were not available for
inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

Inspector contacted licensee.  Licensee communicated with inspector and stated they were not available for
inspection.
